Motion R 10 200 200 50 100 0 255 0 0    50 300 300 50 100 0 255 0 0
Nothing R 50 300 300 50 100 0 255 0 0    51 300 300 50 100 0 255 0 0
Size R 51 300 300 50 100 0 255 0 0    70 300 300 25 100 0 255 0 0

Shape C Ellipse
Nothing C 6 440 70 120 60 0 0 0 255    20 440 70 120 60 0 0 0 255
Motion C 20 440 70 120 60 0 0 0 255    50 440 250 120 60 0 0 0 255
